General.Name: Shennan Circuits Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shennan Circuit Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells printed circuit boards, packaging substrates, and electronic assemblies in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as CATIC Shenzhen Shennan Circuit Company and changed its name to Shennan Circuit Company Limited in January 2000. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Shennan Circuit Company Limited Operates as a subsidiary of AVIC International Holdings Limited.

3.Name: Ms. Lijun  Zhang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
